key.name: enabled
key.summary: Whether the specified command should handle "trash" URLs
key.description: True if the command specified in the "command" key should handle "trash" URLs.

key.name: command
key.summary: The handler for "trash" URLs
key.description: The command used to handle "trash" URLs, if enabled.

key.name: needs-terminal
key.summary: Run the command in a terminal
key.description: True if the command used to handle this type of URL should be run in a terminal.
